title: Focus Consultancy Website

content.value: A comprehensive corporate website for *Focus Consultancy*, designed to showcase their expertise in business strategy, digital transformation, and leadership development. The application is built with a modern tech stack including *React, Vite, and TypeScript*, featuring a fully responsive design, *bilingual support (English and Arabic)*, and *interactive 3D elements*.

content.caption: The landing page features a modern, clean design that immediately establishes professional credibility.

content.value: One of the key features is the *seamless bilingual support*. Users can switch between English and Arabic, with the layout automatically adjusting for *Right-to-Left (RTL)* languages.

content.caption: English interface demonstrating smooth animations and navigation.
Arabic interface with full RTL layout support.

content.value: The website includes a *dedicated contact section* with an integrated form and location map to facilitate easy client communication.
*Performance* was a top priority during development. The site is optimized for *fast loading times* and excellent *Core Web Vitals* scores.

content.caption: Achieving perfect 100 scores on Google PageSpeed Insights for Performance, Accessibility, Best Practices, and SEO.

shortDescription: Modern, bilingual corporate website for Focus Consultancy built with React, Vite, and 3D elements.
metaDescription: Official website for Focus Consultancy. Expert consulting in business strategy, digital transformation, and leadership development.
objectives: Establish a professional digital presence for Focus Consultancy.
Provide a bilingual experience to cater to a wider audience.
Showcase the company's vision, mission, and strategic programs.
Facilitate client communication through an integrated contact form.
Enhance user engagement with interactive 3D visuals.

functionality.description: Seamless switching between English and Arabic with RTL support.
Optimized layout for all devices, ensuring accessibility and usability.
Utilizes Shadcn UI components for a polished and modern look.
Lazy loading of sections for improved performance.
Interactive 3D elements using Google Model Viewer for enhanced visual engagement.

outcomes: Delivered a professional website that aligns with the client's brand identity.
Improved the client's visibility and accessibility to potential customers.
Increased user engagement through 3D visual elements.
